name: Brian JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, COUNTY OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Johnson v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Brian JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, COUNTY OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of November, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
55 A.3d 1055
Brian JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, COUNTY OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.
No. 166 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 9, 2012.
